text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.

You may be counting down the days until Black Friday and Cyber Monday, but let's not forget about Veterans Day. While it's a day to honor those who have fought for our country, it does have lighter, commercialized connotations, like some really amazing sales.

You could go to a physical store, but you'll cover more ground — and be able to shop from your desk — by scouring the web for the best deals.

To make Veterans Day weekend shopping as efficient as possible, below are over 50 sales worth scrolling through this weekend:

Allen Edmonds

Take up to 50% off some of Allen Edmonds boots, loafers, and lace-ups.

All Modern

Save 15% on select rugs, furniture, and lighting with the code "ONEDAYSALE."

Amazon

With tons of amazing deals every day, make Amazon one of your first virtual stops this weekend. If you're not a Prime member already, now's a better time than any to sign up — not only can you get same-day shipping for those last-minute orders, you can also take full advantage of those lightning deals before they sell out.

Backcountry

For a limited time, you can save 20% on one full-price item when you use the code "BC20PERCENT."

Banana Republic

Banana Republic is offering 40% off your entire purchase this weekend.

Bear Mattress

This brand's memory foam mattresses are designed to help your body recover quickly and efficiently after an intense workout. You can save $50 on any size mattress with the code "FALL50" this weekend.

Bellacor

Save up to 80% on lighting and home decor at Bellacor.

Bloomingdales

Shoppers can take $25 off their orders when they use the code "PRIVATE."

Boden

With the code "4QAD," you can save 25% and receive free shipping on orders totaling more than $49.

Clarks

For a limited time, take up to 30% off select styles.

Dockers

Through Sunday, you can save 40% on two items and 50% on three when you enter the code "FROSTY50" at checkout.

Five Four Club

When you enter the code "NOVSHADES," you save 35% on your first order and get a free pair of sunglasses.

Frank + Oak

If you need a new winter coat, enter the code "BRRR20" for 20% off outerwear.

Godiva

Get $10 off orders of $50 or more, $20 off $75 or more, and $30 off $100 or more — no code necessary.

Henri Bendel

Save up to 30% on jewelry, accessories, and home goods.

Huckberry

Huckberry regularly has sales on everything from hoodies to camping equipment. In addition to all of its regular deals, this weekend, shoppers can receive free shipping on select products.

Indochino

You can get a custom suit for $399 when you enter the code "WEEKEND" at checkout — that's up to $400 in savings.



J.Crew

Today only, J.Crew is offering an additional 40% off sale items with the promo code "SALETIME."

Jomashop

The online store is known for its impressive watch discounts, and this weekend is no exception. With up to 65% off tons of watches, there's bound to be a timepiece that fits your budget and taste.

Jonathan Adler

Enter the code "GETFESTIVE" and receive 20% off select furniture, pillows, and tabletop accessories.



Kenneth Cole

This weekend, you can take up to 60% off sale items, plus save an additional 30% with the code "SAVE30."



Le Creuset

You can pick up Le Creuset's non-stick cookware for 20% less this weekend. Perfect timing for your upcoming Thanksgiving dinner.

Leesa

Save $75 on any size mattress with the promo code "FALL75."

Levi's

Through Monday, you can take 30% off your entire order when you enter "EARLY30" at checkout.

L.L.Bean

Take 20% off everything at L.L.Bean — including the brand's popular Bean Boots — with the code "SAVE20.

Macys

The department store is offering up to 20% off select items with the code "VETDAY" and $10 off orders of $25 or more with "VET25."

Michael Kors

Until November 20, you can save an additional 25% off sale items — no code required.

Monoprice

Today only, take $5 off orders totaling more than $25 with the code "VET5," or take $20 off orders over $100 with the code "VET20."

Moosejaw

Save 20% on one full-price item with the code "ANNISALE" or take 30% off select brands.

Nashbar

Friday is your last chance to take an extra 22% off orders of $49 or more.

New Balance

Through Sunday, you can take 15% off sitewide and receive shipping with the code "GOBBLE."

Nordstrom

This weekend, take 40% off tons of clothes, accessories, and home goods.

Patagonia

Head over to Patagonia's "Web Specials" page and you'll find the brand's warm fleece pullovers, windbreakers, swim trunks, and much more on sale.

Paul Fredrick

Take 15% off orders of $150 or more and 25% off when you spend over $300.

Pottery Barn

With the code "SAVEMORE," you can enjoy 10% off orders of $100 or more, 15% off $250 or more, 20% off $500 or more, and 25% off $1,000 or more.

REI

Through November 21, shoppers can take up to 30% off tons of items. REI members can also save 20% on a single full-price or garage item with the code "WINTER20."

Sapira

Save $100 on a mattress from Sapira. The discount is automatically applied at checkout.

Sebago

Today only, you can get select shoes for half off.

Snapfish

Until Sunday, you can take 50% off orders of $30 or more with the code "50HAPPY16."

Speck

Starting at 12 p.m. EST on Monday, Speck will have a six-hour flash sale where you can save 30% on most of the brand's tech accessories.

Spring

At Spring, you can save up to 60% on some of the site's favorite brands.

Steve Madden

You can enjoy an extra 25% off your order and free shipping.

Sunglass Hut

If you're in the market for new shades, Sunglass Hut is offering 50% off select sale styles.



Teabox

Take 25% off your first subscription box when you enter the code "TBSUB25" at checkout.

Ted Baker

The British brand is offering 25% off select pieces.

The Company Store

Enter the code "N16BRAVE" and save 20% on comforters, pillows, and other bedding essentials.

Think Geek

You can currently save up to 60% on tons of "Star Wars" products. May the force be with you.



TOMS

As a token of its appreciation, TOMS is offering 10% off to all military members.

Udemy

Through Tuesday, you can take 75% off tons of online classes with the code "UDEMY1175" or enroll in some courses for $19 each when you enter "UDEMY1119" at checkout.

Wayfair

Take an extra 15% off select sale items with the code "HOLIDAY15."

West Elm

West Elm is currently offering great discounts on bedding, furniture, and rugs.

Williams-Sonoma

When you enter the code "FRIENDS," you receive 20% off your order as well as complimentary shipping.
